audiotemplate_dayinthelife::title: Day in the Life Audio
audiotemplate_dayinthelife::clip_card_11: Record sound of what your character does for fun.
audiotemplate_dayinthelife::clip_card_0:: Record sound where your character lives.
audiotemplate_dayinthelife::clip_card_9:: Record sound of where your character ends the day.
audiotemplate_dayinthelife::clip_card_3:: Record sound of your character getting ready for the day.
audiotemplate_dayinthelife::clip_card_4:: Record sound of a place important to your character.
audiotemplate_dayinthelife::clip_card_10: Record sound of your character interacting with other people.
audiotemplate_dayinthelife::clip_card_12: Ask:Can you please tell us about your future?
audiotemplate_dayinthelife::clip_card_14: Record sound of your character at the end of the day.
audiotemplate_dayinthelife::clip_card_6:: Record something your character does that is important to the story.
audiotemplate_dayinthelife::text_card_0:: A day in the life follows one character throughout the story. The story may follow a literal day, or simply showcase an important part of the day. This template assumes you are following a character with a specific type of work, but the clips can be used to document anyone's day or activity. Feel free to use alternate questions if you think they may work better for you.
audiotemplate_dayinthelife::clip_card_7:: Record sound of your character’s work.
audiotemplate_dayinthelife::clip_card_8:: Record sound of the most important thing to the character's work.
audiotemplate_dayinthelife::clip_card_5:: Ask: Can you please tell us about what you do?
audiotemplate_dayinthelife::clip_card_2:: Record sound of something notable about your character’s home.
audiotemplate_dayinthelife::clip_card_13: Record sound of something important to the character.
